footer.support: Any questions or feedback? Or did you find a problem or bug? Don't hesitate to contact us: {email}.

faq1.question: That could be the first question?
faq1.answer: And to make the answer to this first question a little longer, I'll write a few lines.

faq2.question: And the second question that is not selected?
faq2.answer: And to make the answer to this second question a little longer, I'll write a few lines.

faq3.question: And the third question that is not selected?
faq3.answer: And to make the answer to this third question a little longer, I'll write a few lines

landing.title: Get your bitcoin

introMessageReceiveBtc.message: You are just about to receive {amountAndUnit}

introMessagePreview.headline: Scan a Lightning TipCard to receive some bitcoin.
introMessagePreview.message: You can also get bitcoin at a Crypto exchange (e.g. {exchange}) at a Bitcoin ATM (e.g. {atm}) or from a Crypto broker (e.g. {broker}) etc.

introMessageAlreadyUsed.headline: It seems that this QR code has already been used.
introMessageAlreadyUsed.message: But don't worry: You can get your own bitcoin at a Crypto exchange (e.g. {exchange}) at a Bitcoin ATM (e.g. {atm}) or from a Crypto broker (e.g. {broker}) etc.

introMessageJustReceived.headline: Your QR code has just been used. {emoji}
introMessageJustReceived.message: You can get more bitcoin at a Crypto exchange (e.g. {exchange}) at a Bitcoin ATM (e.g. {atm}) or from a Crypto broker (e.g. {broker}) etc.

paragraphs.1: It is being managed by all members of the bitcoin network, which means it is not under control of any central bank, government, or company.
paragraphs.2: Transactions (including international ones) are as easy as scanning a QR code. Just give it a try!

sectionWallet.headline: Download a wallet
sectionWallet.explanation:
To receive, store and spend your bitcoin, you need a Lightning wallet.
For every-day use and small amounts, a smartphone app is most convenient.
sectionWallet.other: You can also try {wallet0}, {wallet1}, {wallet2} or any other Lightning wallet*.

statusNormal.explanation: As soon as your wallet is installed,
statusNormal.step2:
scan the QR code on your tip card again
(using your wallet app)

statusReceived.message: The bitcoin were just transferred to your wallet.

sectionUse.headline: Use your bitcoin
sectionUse.message: You can now spend your bitcoin at a store or on a website that accepts bitcoin, transfer them to your friend's or colleague's Lightning wallet, or just hodl* them.
sectionUse.messageFootnote: * to hodl = to hold, to save up
sectionUse.examplesIntro: Here are a few websites where you can pay with bitcoin via Lightning:

examples.lightningnetworkstores: Find out what else you could do online

sectionUse.createYourOwnTipCardsText: Would you like to give your friends or colleagues a few Sats (1 Sat = 0.00000001 Bitcoin) or tip someone in Bitcoin? Click on the following button and configure your personal TipCards.

landing.bulkWithdrawExists: A recall of this TipCard is currently in progress. You have to cancel it first to use the card.
landing.bulkWithdrawPending: The sats from this TipCard are being retrieved. If this takes more than a few minutes, please contact support.
landing.bulkWithdrawResetError: An error occurred when cancelling the recall.

errors.errorInvalidLnurl: It seems the LNURL is not from a valid TipCard.
errors.errorInvalidLandingPage: Unable to load custom landing page.

funding.title: Fund your TipCard
funding.headline: Fund this TipCard
funding.text: This tip card has not been funded with sats yet. Specify the amount and the message you want the recipient to see in their wallet.
funding.textFunded: This TipCard is already funded with ({amountAndUnit}) and can be given to somebody who is in need of some orange pilling.
funding.textUsed: This card was funded with {amountAndUnit} and has been redeemed.
funding.textSetFunding: This card will be funded as soon as the invoice of the set is paid. Please come back later.

form.textHint: Will be displayed in the recipient's wallet
form.noteHint: Will be displayed on the status section of your TipCards set

funding.invoiceExpired: The lightning invoice for this card has expired. Please reset the TipCard to continue.
funding.resetDisabledTooltip: This card is already funded with sats.

lnurlp.text: Scan the QR code with your wallet app or click {buttonOpenInWallet} to fund the card. You can enter the desired amount in the wallet app.

funding.lnurlpExpired: Unfortunately the payment link for this TipCard expired. Reset the card to continue.
funding.lnurlpFundedExpired: Unfortunately the payment link for this TipCard expired. Complete the funding to continue.

shared.text: Scan and pay the QR Code as many times as you want and {buttonFinish} as soon as you're done.
shared.textEmpty: This TipCard is still empty. As soon as there are some Sats on it you can complete the card.
shared.textPartiallyFunded: This TipCard is already funded with {amountAndUnit}. As soon as you complete the funding the Bitcoin can be withdrawn.
shared.finishDisabledTooltip: You need to fund this card first.
shared.buttonMakeShared: Activate shared funding on this TipCard

setFunding.title: Set funding
setFunding.headline: Set funding
setFunding.text: This set has {numberOfCardsToFund} cards with no sats on them. Specify the amount per card and the message you want the recipient to see in their wallet. The total invoice will be {amountAndUnit}.
setFunding.textFundingNotPossible: Some cards of this set have already been used. Create a new set to fund a whole set.
setFunding.invoiceText: Fund {numberOfCardsToFund} cards by paying a single invoice of {amountAndUnit}.
setFunding.textFunded: All {numberOfCardsToFund} cards of this set have been funded with {amountAndUnitPerCard} each.

form.smallAmountWarning: Warning: Small amounts per card may cause issues for the recipient when trying to receive their sats. We recommend to use a minimum of 210 sats per card.
form.textHint: Will be displayed in the recipient's wallet
form.noteHint: Will be displayed on the status section of your TipCards set
form.landingPagesHint: This page will be shown when the QR code of a funded card is scanned.

setFunding.resetDisabledTooltip: This set has already been funded
setFunding.invoiceExpired: The lightning invoice for this set has expired. Please reset it to continue.

index.noSavedCardsSetsMessage: You do not have any saved sets yet

home.headline: The easiest way to tip with Bitcoin
home.intro: Simply print out TipCards, top up Sats and make someone happy.
home.quote: It's easy to stick to old habits. But breaking old patterns {em}

create.headline: Create
create.text: Create a TipCards set with one or more TipCards. You can configure them as you like.

print.headline: Print
print.text: Print out the TipCards and cut them out.

fund.headline: Fund the cards
fund.text: Top up the TipCards with Bitcoin.

give.headline: Give away
give.text: Give away the TipCards and make someone happy.

sets.title: All my sets
sets.description: Here you can see all your saved TipCards sets.
sets.noSavedCardsSetsMessage: You do not have any saved sets yet

status.headline: Status
status.noCards: No cards have been funded yet. You will find the status of all cards from this set here after funding your first TipCard.

defaults.cardCopytext:
You got a tip. 🎉
Scan this QR code and learn how to receive bitcoin.

actions.headline: Actions
actions.buttonSaveDisabledTooltip: You can only save sets when you are logged in. Alternatively you can use the URL to access this set.
actions.saveSetConfirm:
The current TipCards set will be saved locally in this browser, using localStorage.

You can also use the URL (from the address bar) to access this TipCards set.

Continue?
actions.deleteSetConfirm: Do you really want to delete the current TipCards set and its settings from this browser?
actions.deleteSetOnServerConfirm: Do you really want to delete the current TipCards set from the server?

setFunding.headline: Fund all cards
setFunding.intro: You can fund single TipCards by scanning the QR code of a new card. If you want to fund all cards of this set at once, use the "Set funding" feature.
setFunding.label: Fund all cards at once
setFunding.disabledReason: Some cards of this set have already been used. Create a new set to fund a whole set.

bulkWithdraw.headline: Get back all unused Satoshis
bulkWithdraw.intro: If you want to withdraw all remaining sats from the whole set at once, click on "Withdraw remaining sats".
bulkWithdraw.label: Withdraw all Satoshis at once
bulkWithdraw.disabledReason: There are no funded cards in this set.

errors.unableToSaveSet: Unable to save set on server.
errors.unableToDeleteSet: Unable to delete set from server.

userAccount.title: Your Account

form.accountNameHint: Internal account name, if you use multiple accounts/lightning nodes.
form.displayNameHint: For future features. Used only if you want to show your name to other TipCards users.
form.emailAddressHint: In case you lose your lightning wallet or device that you used to authenticate.

userAccount.logoutAllOtherDevicesHint: It can take up to 5 minutes until this affects your other devices.

errors.unableToFetchProfile: Error while loading profile data. Please retry or check your internet connection.
errors.unableToSaveProfile: Error while saving profile data. Please retry or check your internet connection.
errors.unableToLogoutAllOtherDevices: Error while logging out all other devices. Please retry or check your internet connection

lnurl.beforeCopy: You can also {action} to paste it into your wallet app.
lnurl.beforeCopyAction: copy the LNURL to your clipboard
lnurl.afterCopyNextStep:
Paste it into
your wallet app now :)

invoice.beforeCopy: You can also {action} to paste it into your wallet app.
invoice.beforeCopyAction: copy the invoice to your clipboard
invoice.afterCopyNextStep:
Paste it into
your wallet app now :)

modalLogin.headline: Login using LNURL-Auth
modalLogin.text: You need a lightning app that supports LNURL-Auth.
modalLogin.loginErrorText: Something went wrong. Please try again later or contact support.
modalLogin.cookieWarning: Your logged in state will be stored as a cookie until you log out.
modalLogin.emailHint: For the case you lose your lightning wallet or device that you used to authenticate, you can store your email address.
modalLogin.emailCta: Enter email address on account page

errors.refreshTokenExpired: Your login expired. This happens when you are inactive for more than 28 days.
errors.refreshTokenDenied: You logged out on another device.

errors.unableToLoadSetsFromBackend: Unable to load sets from the server.
errors.unableToMigrateSets: Migration failed. You can delete the sets manually and save them when logged in.
errors.setBelongsToAnotherUser: Unable to save an unnamed set, as it was already saved by another user.
errors.namedSetBelongsToAnotherUser: Unable to save {name}, as it was already saved by another user.

modalResolveLocalStorage.headline: Transfer TipCards sets
modalResolveLocalStorage.text: Your TipCards sets are currently stored locally in your browser. Transfer them to your account to access them from all your devices.

localStorageDeprecation.message: ⚠️ You have TipCards sets stored locally in your browser. Transfer them to your account to access them from all your devices.

setsPage.headline: Local TipCards sets
setsPage.text: Your TipCards sets are currently stored locally in your browser. Transfer them to your account to access them from all your devices.
setsPage.explanation: Click on the set name to open the set. When logged in, you can save it. Alternatively, you can bookmark the set links.
setsPage.noSets: You do not have any saved sets yet.
setsPage.confirmClearAll: Do you really want to delete all local sets? This action cannot be undone.

bulkWithdraw.title: Withdraw remaining sats
bulkWithdraw.headline: Withdraw sats
bulkWithdraw.withdrawExists: Retrieval of the remaining sats has already been started. You must cancel and restart to display a new QR code.
bulkWithdraw.withdrawPending: The retrieval of the remaining sats has already been started. Wait until they have arrived in your lightning wallet. If this takes more than a few minutes, please contact support.
bulkWithdraw.noFundedCards: There are no funded TipCards in this set.
bulkWithdraw.description: Scan the QR code to get back all unused sats from the displayed TipCards.
